content.raw:
It's OK.  The sim works better with this change, now Val does not collide with the door.  I've already got it optimizing for the new values.  I was just frustrated at losing a weekend's worth of work.  

Also, I am starting a month of travel in early January and the sim only runs on my desktop, not on my laptop.  So I am concerned about this sort of change happening at a point where I cannot respond or adapt to the change, thus losing the contest due to a late change in the code.  As it is, I only have about 10 days left, including the holidays.
content.html:
It's OK. The sim works better with this change, now Val does not collide with the door. I've already got it optimizing for the new values. I was just frustrated at losing a weekend's worth of work.

Also, I am starting a month of travel in early January and the sim only runs on my desktop, not on my laptop. So I am concerned about this sort of change happening at a point where I cannot respond or adapt to the change, thus losing the contest due to a late change in the code. As it is, I only have about 10 days left, including the holidays.
